meanings.definition: A hollow in the earth, especially one opening more or less horizontally into a hill, mountain, etc.
meanings.sent1: The bear found a cozy cave to hibernate in during the winter.
meanings.sent2: Explorers discovered ancient paintings inside the dark cave.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel turned the cave into a luxurious home with a chandelier made of acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cave of forgotten memories, waiting to be rediscovered.
meanings.sent5: The cave echoed with the sound of dripping water, creating a mysterious atmosphere.
